doc.title: Aci hayat
doc.plot: Kerem and Ebru fall in love, getting ready to marry. Yet, the vendetta existing between their families hinders this. The two lovers don't give up and escape to the mountains. Bahri finds them in the hotel and rapes her in Kerem's absence, believing Kerem is dead Ebru gets insane and is sent to an asylum. Kerem kills Bahri and his men. The two lovers get together, as they escape to the mountains the police follows them. They want to die, and stay at the icy cold mountain.
